task.title: Setting up the machine (cont.)
task.shortdesc: How to put together the ice cream machine.

taskbody.context: You'll need all the parts of the ice cream machine.

step.cmd: Place the motor base on a table, counter or other flat surface, making sure a power outlet is within range
Place the frozen freezer bowl on the center of the base
Place the mixing arm in the freezer bowl
Place the lid on the base and turn clockwise to lock
WARNING: THE FREEZER BOWL WILL BEGIN TO DEFROST QUICKLY, SO REMOVE IT FROM THE FREEZER IMMEDIATELY BEFORE YOU PLAN ON USING IT
